resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106170</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106170</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204621</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Spinning spider stories</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spinnende Spinne Geschichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoires de rotation d'araignée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Histórias girando da aranha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia di filatura del ragno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορίες αραχνών περιστροφής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historias de la araña que hacen girar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This interdisciplinary lesson is designed to introduce students to the purpose and process of comparative literature. The literary selections may be altered according to audience and purpose, from grades 5 through 8.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese interdisziplinäre Lektion ist konzipiert, um
Kursteilnehmer zum Zweck und zum Prozeß von Literaturwissenschaften 
vorzustellen. Die literarischen Anwählungen können 
entsprechend Publikum und Zweck, von Graden 5 bis 8 geändert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon interdisciplinaire est conçue pour 
présenter des étudiants au but et au processus de la littérature 
comparative. Les sélections littéraires peuvent être 
modifiées selon des assistances et le but, des catégories 5 à 8.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição interdisciplinary é projetada 
introduzir estudantes à finalidade e ao processo da literatura 
comparativa. As seleções literárias podem ser alteradas de 
acordo com audiências e finalidade, das classes 5 a 8.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione interdisciplinare è destinata per 
introdurre gli allievi allo scopo ed al processo di letteratura 
comparativa. Le selezioni letterarie possono essere alterate 
secondo i pubblici e lo scopo, dai gradi da 5 a 8.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διεπιστημονικό μάθημα έχει ως σκοπό να 
εισαγάγει τους σπουδαστές στο σκοπό και τη διαδικασία της 
συγκριτικής λογοτεχνίας. Τις λογοτεχνικές επιλογές μπορούν 
να αλλάξουν σύμφωνα με το ακροατήριο και το σκοπό, από τους 
βαθμούς 5 μέχρι 8.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección interdisciplinaria se diseña para 
introducir a estudiantes al propósito y al proceso de la literatura 
comparativa. Las selecciones literarias se pueden alterar según
las audiencias y el propósito, de los grados 5 a 8.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>

        </lifeCycle>

              <value>provider</value>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106170</entry>
    </identifier>
